metadata.name: Service Started/Stopped Via Wmic.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects usage of wmic to start or stop a service

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('wmic.exe') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wmic.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' service ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' call ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('stopservice')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('startservice'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of wmic to start or stop a service
